Title: Tar Baby
Plot: A tip from Lemonhead's juvie would leads Vic and Monica to take down a major heroin operation with connections to Antwon Mitchell.  Monica continues to battle Aceveda as she tries to sell her new policies to the community, and Julien begins to doubt her methods.  Claudette loses trust in Dutch when she suspects he made a backroom deal with the D.A.  And Shane and Army find themselves over their heads with Antwon when he blames them for Vic's heroin bust.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
